Html: Is it possible to read wma file from memory stream like in Mp3FileReader? WMAFileReader accept only string. I just need to get TotalTime property of wma file from file upload.
Unfortunately this feature is not available at the moment. This class was contributed by someone else so I'm not sure how hard it would be to add opening from a stream
Briefly looking at the code, it is possible (via IStream), but I don't know how much would be involved in doing that.
